metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40426 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the sphere.c start_read() functionality of Sound Exchange libsox 14.4.2 and master commit 42b3557e. A specially-crafted file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: sox package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
